name: Fort Christmas
description:
The GAME: a Tower Defense Game with time acceleration

STORY: The grincs is trying to destroy the world's biggest christmas tree with his robots and the santa needs your help to defend it

GOAL: you need to defend the christmas tree aginist 60 waves of evil robot things

How To Play: the number in your lef corner is your money, you can place turrets on the stone platforms the x is the sell you can sell your turret for half price

every turret has ammo if its depleted the turret die

Standard Turret price: 40,  ammo 60, damage 1

Sniper Turret pice:80, ammo 35, damage 3
